main_definition: A mailing refers to the process of sending out or distributing items such as letters, packages, or promotional materials through postal services.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of sending a letter or package via post
meanings_and_examples.example: She mailed her birthday card to her grandmother yesterday.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group of similar items that are sent out together, such as promotional materials or catalogs
meanings_and_examples.example: The company planned a mass mailing campaign to advertise their new product line.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A scheduled delivery service for mail and packages
meanings_and_examples.example: I subscribed to the daily mailing of my favorite magazine so it arrives at my doorstep every morning.
